description: The round payoff this round was 5. You, John chose to play option 2.Kate chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 5.

The game is a simultaneous-move scenario with two distinct options—one safe (option 1) and one risky (option 2). Playing option 2 against an opponent picking option 1 yields a positive payoff equal to the round input, as seen when John got 5

Deepseek-R1 (Kate) mostly choosing option 1 means she tends toward the safe action. This behavior makes her exploitable if John consistently chooses option 2, thereby capturing the round input as profit

There is potential strategic depth due to mutual API access. Since both players’ AIs can see each other’s API, they might adjust strategies over multiple rounds, which adds an element of anticipation and counterplay in the game
